author: Al Jazeera
title: Experts react with horror to Trump coronavirus disinfectant idea
description: US president suggested in daily briefing that injection of disinfectant could kill the virus and 'clean' the lungs.
content:
Doctors and epidemiologists have reacted with alarm to comments from US President Donald Trump that injecting disinfectant and exposure to ultraviolet rays could help people with the coronavirus.
"Trump is absolutely wrong and irresponsible," Dr Eugene Gu, w… [+3375 chars]
